  index: "test",
  suggest: {
    text: "noble prize",
    simple_phrase: {
      phrase: {
        field: "title.trigram",
        size: 1,
        direct_generator: [
          {
            field: "title.trigram",
            suggest_mode: "always",
            min_word_length: 1,
          },
        ],
        collate: {
          query: {
            source: {
              match: {
                "{{field_name}}": "{{suggestion}}",
              },
            },
          },
          params: {
            field_name: "title",
          },
          prune: true,
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
